locations.alt: Exterior view of the historic office building at 26 Broadway, New York, NY, home to Opus Virtual Office.
Street view of Opus Virtual Office's Brooklyn, NY building located at 32 Court Street.
Classic office building exterior of Opus Virtual Office in Beverly Hills, showcasing a prestigious location for businesses.
Exterior street view of Opus' modern Los Angeles location at 626 Wilshire Blvd, Los Angeles.
Aerial view of the Chicago skyline near Opus' Chicago virtual office location at 122 South Michigan Avenue.
Glass tower office building with mirrored windows at 3050 Post Oak Blvd, Houston, TX, home to Opus Virtual Office.
Exterior view of Opus Virtual Office building at 1005 Congress Avenue, Austin, TX.
Exterior view of the Austin Opus Virtual Office location on 1005 Congress Avenue, which provides a prime business location.
Exterior view of the Atlanta virtual office building at 3379 Peachtree Road NE, showcasing modern glass architecture and nearby high-rise buildings.
FirstBank building at 848 Brickell Avenue in Miami, where Opus Virtual Office is located.
Modern Boca Raton FL Virtual Office Building at 1825 NW Corporate Blvd.
SunTrust building in Fort Lauderdale, home to Opus Virtual Office.
Exterior view of the virtual office building at 401 E Jackson St, Tampa, FL.
Tall office building at 200 E Robinson Street, Orlando, FL, home to Opus Virtual Office, under a cloudy sky.
View of the downtown Nashville skyline from Opus Virtual Office at 611 Commerce Street, Nashville, TN.
Exterior view of the modern office building at 1201 North Market Street, Wilmington, Delaware, home to Opus Virtual Office.

hero_section.main_heading_desktop: All Opus VO clients have access to meeting rooms in additional top markets!
hero_section.main_heading_mobile: Access meeting rooms in the top US locations.
hero_section.description_desktop: As an Opus Virtual Offices client, when you travel, you have access to fully equipped, professional meeting rooms in the most in-demand markets throughout the USA.
hero_section.description_mobile: As an Opus Virtual Offices client, you gain access to fully equipped, professional meeting rooms in the most in-demand markets throughout the USA.
hero_section.free_hours_text: Register and get 5 free hours that can be used at any of the 16 locations listed below.
features: 5 free hours included for Opus clients (one-time offer)
hero_section.cta_button_text: Register to get your 5 free hours
hero_section.disclaimer: No small print - 5 free hours do not expire

locations_section.heading: The Meeting Room locations you have access
locations_section.subheading: Your 5 free hours for the meeting rooms are only available in the following markets:

right_cities_section.heading: Your Office Away from Home — In the Right Cities
right_cities_section.description: When it's time to meet in person, location matters. As an Opus client, you receive 5 complimentary hours to use in any of our 16 select meeting room locations nationwide. After that, book additional hours for only $25/hour — no contracts, no surprises.
features: Professional, fully equipped spaces for meetings and presentations
On-site receptionist support to welcome your guests
right_cities_section.cta_button_text: Register to get your 5 free hours

book_section.heading: Book your free 5-hours now!
book_section.description: Opus VO Clients get 5 hours with their membership

pricing_card.description: Opus clients receive 5 hours of meeting room access.

content.highlight_text: Access Opus VO Meeting Rooms while you travel to New York, LA, Chicago, Miami and more.

seo.title: Meeting Room Access - Opus Virtual Offices
seo.meta_description: Access professional meeting rooms in top US locations. Opus VO clients get 5 free hours in 16 premium markets including NYC, LA, Chicago, Miami and more.
